tool_description: Process your Ankorstore orders and manage your catalog with the ankorstore API!
name: Ankorstore
title: Ankorstore

api_list.name: Get order shipping labels
api_list.description: After creating the parcels you can fetch the shipping labels if you send them via ankorstore partners. If you ship the order by yourself this endpoint will not retrieve anything

schema.title: Response Get Shipping Labels Api V1 Orders  Order Id  Shipping Labels Get

api_list.name: Get order by id
api_list.description: Fetch order by id. This endpoint allow you to fetch more information about the order such as its status, items, shipping label, tracking, invoices and more (see schema)

api_list.name: Export orders
api_list.description: Fetch your orders export by order status

api_list.name: Get orders
Get products
Get invoice
api_list.description: Fetch invoice url and content by invoice number. You could find the invoice numbers attach to each order within the order model

api_list.name: Get product by id
